description: Devold® Egga is a series of functional mid-layers in 100% Merino wool, with exceptional air flow. This is the perfect combination of insulation and breathability in one single garment. The inside of the material has a grid pattern where temperate air flow. The flexible fit allows optimum freedom of movement which, combined with a high warmth-to-weight ratio, makes these garments perfect for high activity levels when skiing.
name: Devold Egga Grid Merino Vest - Mens
